    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
        Adds the supplied user to the sqlite database. If it already exists then it gets updated in the db
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface IPlugin
        Parameters:
        user - the user to save

      • addCommandToGame

        public void addCommandToGame(ICommand command,
                    IGame game)
        Adds the command to the game in the sqlite db. This will keep up to n commands, as specified in the constructor. A snapshot of the game will be made every n commands.
        Specified by:
        addCommandToGame in interface IPlugin
        Parameters:
        command - the command to add. If null then we will assume this is a new game and will save it as a new game
        game - the game to add the command to

      • getRegisteredUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getRegisteredUsers()
        Gets the users that have been registered with this sqlite db
        Specified by:
        getRegisteredUsers in interface IPlugin
        Returns:
        the users that this store has had registered

      • getGames

        public java.util.List<IGame> getGames()
        Gets the games that have been saved to this sqlite db
        Specified by:
        getGames in interface IPlugin
        Returns:
        the games that have been saved

      • getCommandsForGameId

        public java.util.List<ICommand> getCommandsForGameId(java.lang.Integer gameId)
        Gets the commands for game by the id that have been saved in this sqlite db.
        Specified by:
        getCommandsForGameId in interface IPlugin
        Parameters:
        gameId - the gameId to get the commands for
        Returns:
        the commands for gameId
